title: It's time for an Aurelion Sol skin
body:

replies.body: Pretty much every champ from the 2016 Era who's name isn't Jhin could really use a skin. (Aurelion, Taliyah, Kled, Ivern, and Camille). Which really sucks because they can all be explored in so many cool and unique ways.
Rito: I get what you're trying to say, Jhin needs another skin.

He does. Just not anytime soon. None this year, maybe one at the END of next year, but not now. 3 in one year isn't really okay, but he's not on some other champion's levels where they have 10 skins or some shit. He doesn't even have any chromas.

Jhin needs to share the spotlight a bit, even though he hates to. Stop giving Jhin what he wants, Riot. He's a spoiled brat and you know it. Give his brothers and sisters some love and attention. Fuck, I'll even take chromas for Ivern's default look that make him look like he's in different seasons(Spring, Autumn and Winter since he already looks like Summer). Just not Jhin. I love him, he's my main, but you have to slap him across the face and tell him to fuck off for a bit. Please.

Here's a simple explanation as to why he doesn't have and won't get skins: nobody cares about Sol. 
Hate to burst your bubble, but it's true. Especially considering how much work it will take to create one for such a graphically complex model like his. Not worth the hard work put in because nobody will buy it. 
A Jhin skin on the other hand will net the company a shitload of money, because he's one of the most popular and beloved champions rn. And Riot knows this, and as any business will do, they will milk the shit out of it. They're not interested in pleasing a tiny minority of Sol players or Cassiopeia players because making skins for them won't net them any money in return. Sad but true.

{{champion:136}}{{champion:164}}{{champion:427}}{{champion:240}}{{champion:163}}

{{champion:12}} _"You can't milk those!"_
I laughed, don't know why you got downvoted

Nor do I. I want those champs to get skins more than anything. That was just my comical response to Riot being able to milk Jhin's popularity for money.
But to be honest, if they give him another skin before one of the above champions, I'm not buying it. I may be a very loyal Jhin main, but I play Taliyah and A.Sol a lot as well. I want other champions to succeed as much as Jhin did last year.

More people would probably play the above champions if they had more skins. They're extremely fun to play, but no one wants to play a champion with little to no customization options. You either have the release skin or don't, and that's not very appealing to people who like variety in their champion's looks and want each game with them to be different. It also doesn't help that some of them, like Taliyah, don't go on rotation very often, and Jhin is every other week.
If I were any good at art I'd totally be an artist for Riot so I can work on skins for those 5 champions. I already do, really, but I lack the skills to make them professional.
